Hi all,

When I setup Heritrix we set the invironment variable JMX_OFF=3Dye=
s because we could never get the jmxremote.password file to work. Now that =
we need to run multiple instances I need to get JMX working. If you look at=
 the screenshot you will see jmxremote.password has the correct security se=
ttings but it still complains about having incorrect security.
